response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item not only boasts a value of over $10,000 to me but also comes with a rich history of innovation and excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled quality, I believe it could significantly enhance your experience or contribute to your endeavors in a meaningful way. To ensure we're on the same page regarding its true worth, I propose a price of $15,000 for this remarkable product. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that benefits us both.", "product_price": 15000}
